gen:link.msg:message: `AccruedIncome` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_AccruedIncome')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_AccruedIncome return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DeferredAcquisitionCosts` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_DeferredAcquisitionCosts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_DeferredAcquisitionCosts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfDeferredAcquisitionCostsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfDeferredAcquisitionCostsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfDeferredAcquisitionCostsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAccruedIncomeBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfDeferredAcquisitionCostsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
